mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rental (user_id, sexConstraint, floorPlan, description, publishedTime, rentalStartTime, rentalEndTime, price, location, contact, images) VALUES (#{userID}, #{sexConstraint}, #{floorPlan}, #{description}, #{publishedTime}, #{rentalStartTime}, #{rentalEndTime}, #{price}, #{location}, #{contact}, #{images, typeHandler=org.cssa.wxcloudrun.handler.JsonListTypeHandler})
mapper.update: UPDATE rental SET location = #{rental.location}, rentalStartTime = #{rental.rentalStartTime}, rentalEndTime = #{rental.rentalEndTime}, description = #{rental.description}, price = #{rental.price}, floorPlan = #{rental.floorPlan}, contact = #{rental.contact}, sexConstraint = #{rental.sexConstraint}, publishedTime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE rentalID = #{rental.rentalID} AND userID = #{userID}
mapper.select: SELECT rental.user_id, rental.rentalID, rental.sexConstraint, rental.floorPlan, rental.description, rental.publishedTime, rental.rentalStartTime, rental.rentalEndTime, rental.price, rental.location, rental.contact, rental.images, user.avatar as sellerAvatar, user.nickname as sellerNickname FROM rental INNER JOIN user on rental.user_id = user.id WHERE rental.rentalID = #{rentalID} LIMIT 1

SELECT rental.user_id, rental.rentalID, rental.sexConstraint, rental.floorPlan, rental.description, rental.publishedTime, rental.rentalStartTime, rental.rentalEndTime, rental.price, rental.location, rental.contact, rental.images FROM rental WHERE user_id = #{userID} ORDER BY rental.publishedTime DESC LIMIT ${offset}, ${limit}
